Name: Standing Statue of Hegeb Khenw
Description: The statue of Hegeb Khenw depicts him standing, wearing a long kilt with a pleated front overlap that is held in place with a belt. He has short black hair and his heavy features are highly individualistic. His strikingly large eyes dominate his face. The eyes and eyebrows are painted in black. The wood of the face and the left foot are fractured. The statue stands on a base on which both feet are placed on slight elevations.
